summary: Fatou is desperate for love and affection, so she and her friend put out half naked pictures on the net, and meet older boys. The boys know how to take advantage of that, and then it goes awfully wrong.
cast: Haddy Jallow|Diza Dahlström Franzén|Celestine Davidsson|Mohamed Said|Erik Engström|Sophie Andrén|Renaida Braun|Paulina Michel|Ndey Nije|Adjovi Folly|Anton Raukola|Staffan Hammar|Armin Osmancevic|André Nazemi|Kristina Rådström|Rolf Jenner|Helen Braun|Stephane Mounkassa
title: Säg att du älskar mig
